text.page:
374
102-187b @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bI re bI re/ ma ti te dze/ te dza ma ti d+hA ra NI/ shru ta d+hA ra NI/ dza yan+ti bi dza yan+ti/ ma ti d+hA ra NI swA hA/ sman bram hi zho gnyis zhib tu btags te/ 'o ma'i nang du bskol la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te zhag bdun gyi bar du 'thungs na gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am/ bstan bcos kyang rung ste/ thos na nyin zhag gcig la sho lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro/ /sho lo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho//
